website_summaries.verdict: A multi-tasking serum with vitamin C for brightness and smoothness.
pros: This vitamin and antioxidant-packed serum combats discoloration and wrinkles
Makes your skin instantly feel softer and appear brighter, even your under eye areas
Results seen in just seven days
cons: The price causes some users "to hate that they love it so much" even though pricier models exist

customer_reviews.title: I am on my 3rd bottle now and absolutely LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is suppose to. I am on my 3rd bottle now and absolutely LOVE this product. It literally took 5-7 years off my face which is why people are shocked when I tell them my age. Everyone should use hydration moisturizer (every day), retinol and vit c at least every other day. I alternate using retinol and vit c and people have noticed the difference. Try it!!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Essential for face & décolletage!
customer_reviews.text: Love this serum. One of the first steps of my pre-makeup regime as well as my nightly routine. Vitamin C is a prime ingredient of collagen, the substance that binds cells together. ... Stable collagen production fights wrinkles, and ensures evenness in the skin's tone and texture. Vitamin C's function as an antioxidant also benefits the skin, as it is able to protect the skin from damaging free radicals.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: doesn't last long and no difference
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product two times and I was so excited about it because of my acne prone skin. lot of reviews were saying that it would help their acne. the first few weeks I felt some progress with both acne and scars but then later it didn't do much and my pimples were back again. I kept using it and bought it the second time but still didn't see much difference and didn't buy it again. It's way over priced and doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Gulin k

customer_reviews.title: Product changed. Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product but Perricone changed it! It is now a milky substance that does not absorb and does nothing for my skin. Bring back the great old serum!

customer_reviews.title: Mattes oily skin, minimizes pores, lines and breakouts
customer_reviews.text: I recently tried a cheaper ($20 serum) instead of going back to this one, because vitamin C is just Vitamin C, right? Wrong. This serum mattes my oily skin, made my complexion brighter, minimized my pores and breakouts. You really do get what you pay for. I will be buying this again, but from Amazon as it's 5 bucks cheaper here.
